actions.command: age_of_exile stat give @s exact physical_weapon_damage GLOBAL_INCREASE origin_aoe1 5 5
age_of_exile stat give @s exact dark_weapon_damage GLOBAL_INCREASE origin_aoe2 7 7
age_of_exile stat give @s exact dark_weapon_damage FLAT origin_aoe3 7 7
age_of_exile stat give @s exact water_resist FLAT origin_aoe4 -15 -15
age_of_exile stat give @s exact light_resist FLAT origin_aoe5 -15 -15
age_of_exile stat give @s exact ranged_dmg_received FLAT origin_aoe6 -15 -15

name: 능력치
description:
§d어둠속성의 무기피해량§r이 늘어나고, §b물,§e빛§r속성에 취약해집니다.
§f§l특수 능력치 : 받는 투사체 피해 -15%
